DOC.brief_title: Inferior Submucosal Turbinectomy Versus Blunt Turbinectomy Inferior Turbinate Hypertrophy
DOC.detailed_description: The two method nasal inferior turbinectomy well popularize use long period time . Endoscopic submucosal inferior turbinectomy perform hospital blunt turbinectomy perform usually privat clinic outside hospital endoscopic equipment . We examine subjective ( QOL questionaire ) objective parameter ( rhinomanometry- non invasive method evaluate nasal airflow , saccharine test , nasal endoscopy ) comparison outcome two method .
